overview: Will some dogs be popped? Will some hogs be talked? Does a bear shit in the woods? Roderick Strong does, and on this edition of Best Friends you'll hear all about it. The boys are back to pound some cheap beer, take their shirts off and tweet The Rock. So don't blink cause we're coming in hot on this edition of Best Friends with Chuck and Trent? Topics include: Roddy's Shitty Little Camping Trip/Jerry Lynn/Warlord suing Pizza Hut/Run ins by Brian Myers & Rich Swann/Kissing Dudes/Big Dog Kurt Angle/Picking fights with Bikers/Tweeting The Rock
title: Best Friends With Roderick Strong
